post:
**[VPSCheap](https://vpscheap.net)** has been offering reliable [cheap VPS services](https://vpscheap.net/pricing.aspx) since 2011. Our servers are located in a top-tier Chicago facility. 24/7 support is available, with an average time to first response of 17 minutes.

All VPSCheap plans include:

- User-friendly administration panel. Every tool you need to manage your server is available in our control panel.
- Painless DNS management. We offer an integrated DNS management system, so you can get all of your DNS setup in just a few clicks.
- Unmetered bandwidth. We don't limit how much traffic goes through your server. No overage charges, ever.
- Instant setup. The moment your order is paid, our automated system will set up your server and deliver it within 5 minutes.

This month, we're offering an exclusive deal. Get up to a 36% lifetime discount on our annual plans!

Plans in offer:

**SSD Basic**

- 256MB RAM
- 2 CPU Cores
- 10GB SSD Disk Space
- 1 IPv4 address
- 1 IPv6 address
- Unmetered network (35 Mbit port speed)

<del>$28/year</del> **$18/year**

Coupon code: LETAPRIL1 (already applied)

[**Add to cart**](https://crm.vpscheap.net/cart.php?promocode=LETAPRIL1&a=add&pid=183&billingcycle=annually)


**SSD Business**

- 512MB RAM
- 2 CPU Cores
- 30GB SSD Disk Space
- 1 IPv4 address
- 1 IPv6 address
- Unmetered network (45 Mbit port speed)

<del>$48/year</del> **$32/year**

Coupon code: LETAPRIL2 (already applied)

[**Add to cart**](https://crm.vpscheap.net/cart.php?promocode=LETAPRIL2&a=add&pid=184&billingcycle=annually)


Questions? Need more info? You can reach us at support@vpscheap.net or visit our [website](https://vpscheap.net/).
